notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Yor content go anonymize na 7 day for
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: All yor content na dis komuniti go anonymize and archive na 7 day, afta dat yu no go fit delete am or change am. Luk yor content unda.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: All yor content na dis grup go anonymize and archive na 7 day, afta dat yu no go fit delete am or change am. Luk yor content unda.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Klik on di komuniti link unda, login as admin and select Fraud management from di menu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Nomba of possible fraudulent activities wit estimated 75% chance of fraud
email.possibleFraudInformation: We automated system don identify possible fraudulent activity. Yu fit take a closer look tru di Community admin interface. Some of dis activity might get non fraudulent reasons so be careful to investigate thoroughly before deleting content.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Dis content don automatically flag as toxic using AI algorithms wey estimate di toxicity of di content. Yu fit delete di content if needed.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: An AI algorithm automatically don flag visual imagery connected to dis content. Dis algorithm reviews images for possible adult, violent, medical, and racy imagery. Yu fit delete di content if needed.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Sometime di AI algorithm de calculate wrong score, if dat happen no worry, you no need for do anytin else and can ignore dis email.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: English text wey dem use for score
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: A new point don add to dis idea
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: A new point don add to you idea
email.writtenByUser: Write by a user wey name na
email.hasBeenReported: don report for violating di terms
email.postReport: Idea don dey report for violate di terms
email.pointReport: Point don dey report for violate di terms
email.user_invite_1: Yu don dey invite for take part na...
email.user_invite_2: Click pan di link or paste am inside browser address bar for accept di invitation
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Point marked unhelpful for mi idea
email.pointHelpfulSelf: Point marked helpful for mi idea
email.reset_password_1: Na ya de link for change yu password.
email.reset_password_2: If yu noh request dis, abeg ignore dis email.
email.reset_password_3: Yu password nor go change until yu follow di link wey dey up so and create a new one.
